name: DemonicGuestVR
description: A small VR Horror Experience for VR
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 - 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 / AMD R9 290x Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: AMD cards need a higher spec than Nvidia
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7-4790 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 390 Storage: 2 GB available space
